# chr1
======
Region 120000000-140000000 is in the 
spurious red arrows region
# Regions 
# R1: 1000000-20000000
# R2: 20000000-40000000
# R3: 40000000-60000000
# R4: 60000000-80000000
# R5: 80000000-100000000
# R6: 100000000-120000000
# R7: 140000000-160000000
# R8: 160000000-180000000
# R9: 180000000-200000000
# R10: 200000000-220000000
# R11: 220000000-240000000

# chr2 
======

is in the spurious red arrows

# R4: 60000000-80000000
# R5: 100000000-120000000

# R8: 160000000-180000000
# R9: 180000000-200000000
# R10: 200000000-220000000
# R11: 220000000-240000000
